label: A3B4C_cP8_215_c_e_b-001
title: Sulvanite (Cu$_{3}$S$_{4}$V, $H2_{4}$) Structure
comments: This structure is very similar to \href{current_web_home_dir/AB3C4_cP8_215_a_c_e-001}{lazarevi\'{c}ite (AsCu$_{3}$S$_{4}$)}, except that in this case the copper atoms are on the cubic edges [the (3d) sites] rather than the cubic faces [the (3c) sites].
